Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 53rd overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2016...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Texas on 7/31/2018 (Going to TEX: RF K. Cuyler Jr., LF B. Miller Jr., P M. Price, P M. Scherzer. Going to TB: SS J. Segura, LF T. Crowe)...
Injured on 5/11/2019 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Released by Texas on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 6/16/2020 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 7/7/2020, off Chris Carpenter (FLA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/2021, off Chris Stratton (MIL)...
